blog.name: thefandomimagine
blog.title: The Fandom Imagine
blog.description: Buy Me A Coffee Patreon Page WARNING:These tags do include NSFW posts Marvel Doctor Who Harry Potter LOTR Sherlock Supernatural Star Wars OUAT Teen Wolf DC Others Oneshots Aesthetic Fake Texts Headcanons Moodboards NSFW An imagines blog for any and all fandoms. Please note that I do not own any of the gifs used and if you see any of your own gifs, then message me and I will happily put your name in the tags, to give credit where credit is due or remove it if that is what you wish. You are always welcome to write stories based on any of the imagines I myself will do gif imagines, fake texts, aesthetics and headcanons. However any oneshots on the blog are wrote by followers. If you wish to submit a oneshot idea than I will post it to everyone, however it is up to them if it is actually published. NSFW posts are published on the last Sunday of the month. All fandoms are welcome.

summary: Before y'all completely implode because of the End Game trailer.... (A THEORY)
body:
Before y'all completely implode because of the End Game trailer…. (A THEORY)

Y'all are aware that Captain Marvel comes out BEFORE Avengers 4 for a REASON???? We get more explanation of who’s in space and could help Tony.

(Now, I have extremely limited knowledge of the whole history of all of the Kree/Skrull mess, but this is based off the wikia and what I do know– so this is a disclaimer)

Tony is on a ship that Nebula seems to be on as well. And she is familiar with it enough that her, or tech genius Tony could figure out a distress signal. We know SOMEBODY is probably going to bite the dust peranantly in this movie, but I doubt it’ll be Tony. Anyyywayyyy: Captain Marvel is probably still making her way to earth from wherever she is. And half Kree? They’ve gotta be somewhere, right? So Tony’s probably gonna get rescued, so we can get those dark and gritty Avengers (2012) parallels.

tags: i finally wrote a clint and carol thing and damn it was fun
summary: these are the days that must happen to you - andibeth82
title: these are the days that must happen to you - andibeth82
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
When Fury says, “I know a renegade soldier when I see one,” Carol remembers her life in flashes. She remembers a man spitting out the words in spiteful distaste: “I know a renegade soldier when I see one.” She remembers a girl with swaggering confidence, a best friend with a crooked smile: “I know a renegade soldier when I see one.” She remembers a boy with chocolate skin and an impish grin trying to hide the flush on his face after a kiss: “I know a renegade soldier when I see one.”

And when she picks up a lanky boy with long hair and an overgrown beard on the side of the highway, she takes one look at the bow strapped across his back, leans forward in the driver’s seat as she slows to a stop, and invites him in.

And when she picks up a lanky boy with long hair and an overgrown beard on the side of the highway, she takes one look at the bow strapped across his back, leans forward in the driver’s seat as she slows to a stop, and invites him in.

When Fury says, “I know a renegade soldier when I see one,” Carol remembers her life in flashes. She remembers a man spitting out the words in spiteful distaste: “I know a renegade soldier when I see one.” She remembers a girl with swaggering confidence, a best friend with a crooked smile: “I know a renegade soldier when I see one.” She remembers a boy with chocolate skin and an impish grin trying to hide the flush on his face after a kiss: “I know a renegade soldier when I see one.”

And when she picks up a lanky boy with long hair and an overgrown beard on the side of the highway, she takes one look at the bow strapped across his back, leans forward in the driver’s seat as she slows to a stop, and invites him in.

Don't mind her, I just...love her. :3

summary: What is your honest opinion on Captain Marvel and her movie?
question: What is your honest opinion on Captain Marvel and her movie?
answer:
You said honest opinion. So, here is my answer. I’m only watching the movie solely for the story, to see how it connects to the events of Infinity War and Avengers Endgame. Captain Marvel herself doesn’t really interest me much as a character and her lack of emotion in the trailer is rather underwhelming. 

I’m more interested in Nick Fury’s younger days and why he has trust issues to begin with. If I am correct, Ronan is in the movie as well and I’m quite excited as he is one of my favorite villains. I’m aware some might disagree with my opinion of Captain Marvel, but for some reason, this is the only Marvel movie of the MCU that doesn’t truly excite me even the slightest. But as a fan of the lore, I NEED to see it in order to understand more of the alien species in the Marvel universe as well as seeing how it relates to Infinity War. 

Some people suggest she will play a big role in Avengers 4, but I’m more interested in Ant-Man’s role than Captain Marvel’s.
